関連科目: No pre-requisite classes; only an interest in English.
授業の概要・背景: This course is primarily designed for students who have TOEFL/TOEIC scores lower than the minimum required for registration into IE, but students who meet that requirement can still register for Basic if they desire low-level English practice or review. This course also functions to introduce students to LC courses and the personal benefits associated with studying abroad. The course is four-skills and meets once a week.
授業方法:
Face to face format

Students can expect various individual and pair work activities that improve English reading, writing, listening, and speaking skills. Students will also be able to improve their self-study skills and develop as autonomous learners capable of working toward their own language learning goals.
